member.name: T:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument
member.summary: Routines for manipulating an RTF document using the TxTextControl Express Edition library. Requires RTF Document Constructor Library from CodeProjet: http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/98062/RTF-Document-Constructor-Library

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Full path to the output file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Full path to the output file.
True to overwrite existing file with same name. Otherwise, set to false to throw an error if file with same name already exists.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML string to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: String containing valid XML formatted data.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML document object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: XML formatted document object.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Writes data contained in ADO.NET DataTable object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: DataTable object containing data to be imported.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.DocumentFilePath
member.summary: Specifies path to the word document on disk.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFRTFDocument.ReplaceExistingFile
member.summary: If True and file already exists, the old file will be deleted and the new file created. If False, an error will be raised if a file by the same name already exists.
member.remarks: Default is True. An existing file with same name will be deleted.

member.name: T:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument
member.summary: Class for generating PDF documents. Requires GemBox Document third party product license and client software to work.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Full path to the output file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Full path to the output file.
True to overwrite existing file with same name. Otherwise, set to false to throw an error if file with same name already exists.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML string to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: String containing valid XML formatted data.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML document object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: XML formatted document object.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Writes data contained in ADO.NET DataTable object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: DataTable object containing data to be imported.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.DocumentFilePath
member.summary: Specifies path to the PDF document on disk.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFPDFDocument.ReplaceExistingFile
member.summary: If True and file already exists, the old file will be deleted and the new file created. If False, an error will be raised if a file by the same name already exists.
member.remarks: Default is True. An existing file with same name will be deleted.

member.name: T:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument
member.summary: Routines for manipulating a Word document using the GemBox Word library. Creating Word 2003 (DOC format) documents requires Sharp2Word Library, which can be obtained from Google at http://code.google.com/p/sharp2word

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enWordOutputFormat)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2003 for an XLS file. Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2007 for an XLSX file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enWordOutputFormat,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2003 for an XLS file. Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2007 for an XLSX file.
Full path to the output file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enWordOutputFormat,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2003 for an XLS file. Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2007 for an XLSX file.
Full path to the output file.
True to overwrite existing file with same name. Otherwise, set to false to throw an error if file with same name already exists.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML string to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: String containing valid XML formatted data.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML document object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: XML formatted document object.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Writes data contained in ADO.NET DataTable object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: DataTable object containing data to be imported.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.WordOutputFormat
member.summary: Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2003 for DOC format. Set to enWordOutputFormat.Word2007 for DOCX format.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.DocumentFilePath
member.summary: Specifies path to the word document on disk.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFWordDocument.ReplaceExistingFile
member.summary: If True and file already exists, the old file will be deleted and the new file created. If False, an error will be raised if a file by the same name already exists.
member.remarks: Default is True. An existing file with same name will be deleted.

member.name: T:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument
member.summary: Routines for manipulating an Excel document using the ComponentOne Excel for .NET library.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enExcelOutputFormat)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2003 for an XLS file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2007 for an XLSX file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enExcelOutputFormat,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2003 for an XLS file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2007 for an XLSX file.
Full path to the output file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enExcelOutputFormat,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2003 for an XLS file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2007 for an XLSX file.
Full path to the output file.
True to overwrite existing file with same name. Otherwise, set to false to modify contents of existing file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enExcelOutputFormat,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2003 for an XLS file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2007 for an XLSX file.
Full path to the output file.
Name of the Excel sheet where data is to be written to or read from.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enExcelOutputFormat,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2003 for an XLS file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2007 for an XLSX file.
Full path to the output file.
Name of the Excel sheet where data is to be written to or read from.
True to overwrite existing file with same name. Otherwise, set to false to modify contents of existing file.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.#ctor(PFDocumentGlobals.enExcelOutputFormat,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2003 for an XLS file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2007 for an XLSX file.
Full path to the output file.
Name of the Excel sheet where data is to be written to or read from.
True to overwrite existing file with same name. Otherwise, set to false to modify contents of existing file.
True to overwrite existing sheet with same name. Otherwise, set to false to modify contents of existing sheet.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML string to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: String containing valid XML formatted data.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.
member.remarks: Non Ext version of WriteDataToDocument will report an error if ReplaceExistingFile is false and file exists.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML document object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: XML formatted document object.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.
member.remarks: Non Ext version of WriteDataToDocument will report an error if ReplaceExistingFile is false and file exists.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.WriteDataToDocument(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Writes data contained in ADO.NET DataTable object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: DataTable object containing data to be imported.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.
member.remarks: Non Ext version of WriteDataToDocument will report an error if ReplaceExistingFile is false and file exists.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.AppendDataToExistingSheet(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Writes data contained in ADO.NET DataTable object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: DataTable object containing data to be imported.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.
member.remarks: AppendDataToExistingDocument will report an error if workbook or sheet cannot be found.s.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.WriteDataToDocumentExt(System.String)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML string to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: String containing valid XML formatted data.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.
member.remarks: Ext version of WriteDataToDocument has extra logic for modifying existing documents.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.WriteDataToDocumentExt(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Writes data contained in XML document object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: XML formatted document object.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.
member.remarks: Ext version of WriteDataToDocument has extra logic for modifying existing documents.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.WriteDataToDocumentExt(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Writes data contained in ADO.NET DataTable object to path stored in DocumentFilePath property.
member.param: DataTable object containing data to be imported.
member.returns: True if output operation is successful. False if write fails.
member.remarks: Ext version of WriteDataToDocument has extra logic for modifying existing documents.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.ExportExcelDataToDataTable(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: ExportDataToDataTable
member.param: Name given to a range of cells in the document.
If true, then export will assume first row contains column names.
member.returns: DataTable object that contains the values in the given excelNameRange.

member.name: M:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.ExportExcelDataToDataTable(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: ExportDataToDataTable
member.param: First row of Excel range.
First column of Excel range.
Last row of Excel range.
Last column of Excel range.
If true, then export will assume first row contains column names.
member.returns: DataTable object that contains the values in the given range of Excel cells.
member.remarks: Row and col values are zero based. e.g. 0,0 to 99,99 for a range of 100 rows and 100 columns.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.ExcelOutputFormat
member.summary: Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2003 for an XLS file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.Excel2007 for an XLSX file. Set to enExcelOutputFormat.CSV for a CSV file.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.DocumentFilePath
member.summary: Full path to the document file.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.SheetName
member.summary: Name of Excel sheet to use. Default is Sheet1.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.ReplaceExistingFile
member.summary: If True and file already exists, the old file will be deleted and the new file created. If False, an error will be raised if a file by the same name already exists.
member.remarks: Default is True. An existing file with same name will be deleted.

member.name: P:PFDocumentObjects.PFExcelDocument.ReplaceExistingSheet
member.summary: If True and sheet already exists, the old sheet will be deleted and the new sheet created. If False, an error will be raised if a sheet with the same name already exists.
member.remarks: Default is True. An existing sheet with same name will be deleted.
